channel.title: Shop making help please
channel.description:
ok i have the shop # and the items i want below
[code]shop = 31 Test_Store 2 2 7502 500 1856 500 1118 500 1140 500 1156 500 1174 500 1190 500 1278 500[/code]
now all i need is somewhere to add the shop location...btw this is already added into the shop.cfg or whatever it is also btw im using cheezscape

item.title: Shop making help please
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

oh…wow i am dumb…i had a space in my cfg file that wouldnt let me open the shops and view what they had in them in the game…lol

Read full topic

item.title: Shop making help please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

java ignores space so except for cfg files ure compiler wont give u errors for space.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop making help please
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

ok, i have toyed with it a little and i reset all the stuff i did to it because you were completely wrong.

this is how it should look.

} else if (NPCID == XXXX) { //name here PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = XX; //name here

with 4 tabs infront of the } and 1 more for the two lines below that.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop making help please
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

search for

zeke

in client.java

and under it add

} else if (NPCID == XXXX) { // Zeke PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; // Test Shop

change XXXX to your npc’s ID.

Read full topic
